step_2: Taking O as center, draw an arc intersecting ray OA at P.
step_3: With P as center, draw an arc to intersect the previous arc at Q.
step_4: With Q as center, draw an arc to intersect the previous arc at S.
step_5: Join OS and extend it. Measure the angle ∡SOP using a protractor. ∡SOP = 120°.
